question.title: Return whole child DTO inside parentDto
question.body:
I have class student(Parent class) and school(child class) DTO. When i try to print parent class i am not getting child class with all fileds.

Class Student{
  private String name;
  private  School school;

}

Class School{
  private String schoolName;
  private String address;

}

while returning Student.builder().build(). without including specially school field in builder return Student.builder().school(School.builder().build()).build()

I getting output:

{name: null, school:null}

I want :

{name:null , school: {schoolName: null, address: null}}
